org.apache.juneau.http

Class HeaderStringArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.http.HeaderStringArray
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Allow, ContentLanguage, Upgrade, Via

    @Header(type="array",
        collectionFormat="csv",
        items=@Items(type="string"))
public class HeaderStringArray
extends Object
    Category of headers that consist of a comma-delimited list of string values.

    Example

    Allow: GET, PUT

    • Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1
